transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, mai Kusum baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART headquarter se senior manager. Sir abhi aapne IndiaMART headquarter ke customer care me call kiya tha sir isliye maine aapko call kiya hai. Aapki baat ho gayi aapke call manager Nidhi ji se sir?
Customer: Haan, baat ho gayi, baat ho gayi.
Executive: Meeting schedule ho gayi sir aapki kal ke liye 11 baje ke liye?
Customer: Ji 11:30 ke liye.
Executive: Achcha achcha, actually na sir aapne IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kar diya tha to mai concern aapko close kar du sir? Aapka jo discussion hai wo Nidhi ji ke saath ho gaya?
Customer: Ji, haan haan, ho gaya, haan ho gaya.
Executive: Baaki aapko koi bhi concern ho aap mere is number pe connect kar sakte ho ya phir aap Nidhi ji ko personally call kar sakte ho, theek hai? Baaki yes, abhi mai ticket close karungi na sir to aapke paas mail pe feedback aayega, ek request kyuki please aap waha pe apna positive response dijiyega taaki mai concern close kar pau sir.
Customer: Achcha mail me aayega kya?
Executive: Haan mail pe bas aapke hoga ki aapke call manager ke saath discussion hua ya nahi hua yes ya no karke to aap please waha pe apna positive response de dijiye sir, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Baaki mai reminder laga deti hu kal morning me aapko call karne ke liye, theek hai?
Customer: 11:30 ka haan haan haan.
Executive: 11:30 ka na, theek hai sir, sir bas aap apna positive response de dijiyega mail pe mai aage karwa deti hu, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about the call with Nidhi.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the meeting schedule.

- Executive requested positive feedback on mail.

- Executive set a reminder to call the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, feedback, call schedule
